law.catch_line: When items subject to notice, stop-payment order, legal process, or setoff -- Order in which items may be charged or certified.

text.section: Subject to subsection (1), items may be accepted, paid, certified, or charged to the indicated account of its customer in any order.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 101, effective January 1, 1997. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 4-303, effective July 1, 1960.
